## Task 1

### Part A

We cannot use the read_csv() to read in these data because the delimiter is a semicolon and not a comma.

```{r}
data <- read_csv2("data/data.txt")
data
```

### Part B

```{r}
data2 <- read_delim("data/data2.txt", delim = "6", col_types = "fdc")
data2
```
